title: Governance Threshold Configuration Module Schema
description: Defines critical, auditable numeric thresholds required for GSEP L4 Commitment Arbitration (P-01). Managed exclusively by GCM-A.

Utility_Min.description: The minimum required Efficacy Projection Score (S-01) threshold required for L4 commitment.

Exposure_Max.description: The maximum acceptable Risk Synthesis Score (S-02) threshold required for L4 commitment.

Veto_Policy_Hash.description: A cryptographic hash linking to the current immutable AOC (S-03) text.

last_modified_timestamp.description: Timestamp of the last successful GCM-A update, logged to AIA.
